content: PROTECTION OF EMPLOYEES FROM RETALIATION BY THEIR EMPLOYER FOR COOPERATING IN INVESTIGATIONS. The Oil Pollution Act of 1990 is amended to include a new section prohibiting retaliation. The Oil Pollution Act of 1990 is amended to include a new section prohibiting retaliation against employees who report violations or refuse to participate in misconduct. The Oil Pollution Act of 1990 is amended to prohibit retaliation against employees who report violations or refuse to participate in misconduct, including notifying authorities or testifying in relevant proceedings.
